safire.data.image_browser module¶

Maps image IDs from an ImagenetCorpus to image files for exploring Safire model performance.

class safire.data.image_browser.ImageBrowser(root, ids2files_map, icorp=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides functionality for looking directly at the images used to build the ImagenetCorpus.

build_tiled_image(iids, similiarities=None, with_order=False, width=1000.0, height=600.0, margin=10.0)[source]¶

Given a list of image IDs, creates a merged image from all of them.

Parameters:
  • iids – A list of image ID from the source list.
  • similarities – A list that gives for each image a similarity to a query “image”.
  • with_order – A flag. If set, will draw in the upper-left corner the order of each image.
  • width – The total width of the output image.
  • height – The total height of the output image.
  • margin – The margin of each sub-image.
load_image(iid)[source]¶

Loads the image with the given image ID.

load_images(iids, similarities=None, with_order=False)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • iids – A list of image ID from the source list.
  • similarities – A list that gives for each image a similarity to a query “image”.
  • with_order – A flag. If set, will draw in the upper-left corner the order of each image. [NOT IMPLEMENTED]
Returns:

A list of images.
parse_ids2files(ids2files_map)[source]¶

Parses the map of IDs to files.

Parameters:ids2files_map (file) – A file-like object from which the ID-to-file mapping will be read. Expected format is two tab-separated columns, with the IDs in the first column and files in the second column.
show(iid)[source]¶

Given an image ID, opens the image.

Parameters:iid – An image ID from the source list.
show_multiple(iids, width=1000, height=600)[source]¶

Given a list of image IDs, creates a merged image from all of them.

Parameters:
  • iid – An image ID from the source list.
  • width – The total width of the output image.
  • height – The total height of the output image.
